item.title: A note on promotion time cure models with a new biological consideration
item.description: arXiv:2408.17188v2 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: We introduce a generalized promotion time cure model motivated by a new biological consideration. The new approach is flexible to model heterogeneous survival data, in particular for addressing intra-sample heterogeneity. We also indicate that the new approach is suited to model a series or parallel system consisting of multiple subsystems in reliability analysis.
item.dc:creator: Zhi Zhao, Fatih K{\i}z{\i}laslan
